items.title: Steam Incident: Fake Block Blasters Game Led to $150,000 Crypto Thefts
items.excerpt: A fraudulent game titled Block Blasters remained available on Steam for more than a month and contained hidden malware that exfiltrated cryptocurrency from playersâ€™ wallets. Security researchers say confirmed losses total at least $150,000 and that the incident underscores gaps in platform safeguards.
